name: ATMCASH
overview:
ATMCASH is an international money transfer service that enables customers to send money online or by phone to more than 150 countries worldwide.

ATMCASH provides customers with an alternative to traditional agent based money transfer services. The new online and over the phone service enables customers to send money 24 hours a day, 7 days a week from the comfort of their own home. With ATMCASH senders can send money in less than one minute without waiting in line at agent locations.

ATMCASH features include 24/7 cash pick up at more than 1.5 million ATM locations worlwide. That’s up to three times more cash pick up locations than the leading competitors. The number of ATM installations is projected to reach 2.5 million by the year 2013, which will greatly expand ATMCASH’s network reach and provide customers with even more pick up locations worldwide.

In addition, ATMCASH uses highly secured encryption technologies and is the only company in the money transfer industry to utilize state-of-the-art voice verification software. With voice verification customers provide their unique secured voice print by repeating a few random digits over the phone. Customers can then use their voice to access their account and send money over the phone. ATMCASH’s voice verification provides accurate and reliable identity verification making sending money over the phone easy and safe everytime. The service is available in both English and Spanish.
